events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking hasn't updated for several days.
The issue was identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of a late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a support agent specializing in delivery and logistics issues to assist the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help resolve this delay for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRK987654321, but the last update was from five days ago.
Thank you for the info. I’ve contacted the shipping carrier for an update and will expedite the process to get your package delivered as soon as possible.
Thanks for your quick response and for checking with the carrier. I appreciate your help in resolving this delay.
The carrier has updated the tracking information and your package is now out for delivery. It should arrive today.
Just checking in to confirm your package was delivered and that you're satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay.
Since the package was delivered and no further issues were reported, we are closing the case. Thank you for your patience.
